Articles.Content:
So I have had some really great ideas for a roleplay campaign that I want to do but even tho I have FASA Launch clamps installed, I feel like I am still lacking some different launch clamps/towers.

The kind of launch clamps/towers I still like to see in KSP are those long vertical arms that you see now a days with expendable launch systems. An example is the launch clamp that is used for the antares rocket (

). I am looking for something like that, especially the way it detatches from the rocket (seen from 0:45 seconds to 0:55 seconds in)

Another example are the launch clamps/tower that is used for the soyuz rocket(

) at 1:15 into the video.

Long story short, I am looking for the long vertical launch clamp arms to use in ksp so if anyone knows where I can find it, please let me know. And NO I am NOT talking about FASA
